objects.text:
• Digital LED Display & Controls
• Multiple Wash Cycle Options
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Large Capacity Front-Loading

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• Digital LED display with easy-to-read time remaining and cycle status
• Multiple wash cycles including Express, Delay, and specialized settings
• Large capacity front-loading design for efficient cleaning
• Advanced temperature control with multiple water temperature options
• Energy-efficient operation with modern wash technology
• Sleek white exterior with black glass door design
• User-friendly control panel with intuitive dial selector
• Custom wash options including soil level and spin speed controls
• Delay start function for convenient scheduling
• Durable construction with stable base and leveling feet
• Modern digital interface with clear cycle indicators
• Compact yet spacious design perfect for any laundry space

banner_details:
This promotional banner is divided into four quadrants using a grid-based background with light and dark blue tones, reflecting a clean, modern aesthetic. The top-left quadrant contains the brand name text layer (`brand_name`) with futuristic styling, followed by bold text layers for the product name (`product_name`) and a sleek tagline (`tagline`) emphasizing innovation. In the bottom-left quadrant, a bulleted feature list (`features`) in white adds detail over a dark blue base. Below it, the price (`price`) is prominently displayed in large white font, with a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) and CTA text (`cta_text`) encouraging user engagement. The right half showcases the product image (`product_image`) with ample white space around it for emphasis.

**Color Palette:**
- Oxford Blue: `#1A3A57`
- Steel Blue: `#2B5D8C`
- Light Powder Blue: `#D1E2F0`
- Ice Blue: `#E9F1F7`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern washing machine with a clean minimalist design. The core color palette is dominated by crisp white (#FFFFFF) for the body, which conveys cleanliness and simplicity. Accents of deep black (#000000) around the door and display contrast sharply to create a bold, modern aesthetic. Metallic silver (#C0C0C0) on the dial adds a touch of sophistication, while the use of electric blue (#00B7FF) in the digital display highlights core functionalities and gives a high-tech feel. These strategic contrasts ensure clarity of controls and blend elegance with usability, ideal for a banner targeting modern, tech-oriented buyers.
